title: DHS Employee Leaks Several Craft Captures
body: So this is a recording off a screen. They could be drones? Could be a bag blowing in the wind? The 2nd one is a weird shape. 3 different videos. The last one, to me looks like someone running. Aliens?

title: Bigfoot spotted in Canada viscously attacking poor dogs
body: This is real, and if it isnt, then it must be a type of science experiment gone wrong
